name: Tappy Plane Quest
description:
Tappy Plane Quest is by flappy bird but with a twist. Tappy Plane Quest is not an infinite game. There are missions which are to be completed by flying the plane by avoiding the obstacles, collect all the letters which forms the word and reach the goal post.

Features:

  • Multiple missions to fly the tappy plane
  • New missions are unlocked after completing certain missions
  • There will be medals for completing certain number of missions
  • Game has coins and gems as collectibles

The game design, programming and social content is created by game.deve.04. The characters are from Kenny.

Hope you enjoy the game and please provide feedback about the game.
